org.openscience.cdk.renderer.visitor

Interface IDrawVisitor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderingVisitor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAWTDrawVisitor, AWTDrawVisitor

    public interface IDrawVisitor
extends IRenderingVisitor
    An IDrawVisitor is an IRenderingVisitor that can be customized and knows about fonts and other rendering parameters.
    Source code:
    master
    Belongs to CDK module:
    render

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Sets the RendererModel this IDrawVisitor should use.
